title: New Season, New Start!
body:
Hi Riot,

In the new season could you please allow for a one month period in which ALL queues are 24/7 to collect data and conclude permanent ones from there?
Idk I think it could be a good idea, considering I never get to play TT because I'm never home when it's 'available' due to work. Maybe there's more out there who can't fit their life around a LoL map opening hours because they have higher importance things to do.

I just want to have fun, ya know?

replies.body: Either either works for me heh {{champion:266}}
I feel preseason is a good time to experiment; as it is usually the time they make major changes.
